name: Book et al., Appellants, v. Hall et al.

judges: Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Barnes and Patterson, JJ.
parties: Book et al., Appellants, v. Hall et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree in this case is affirmed on the opinion of the learned chancellor directing it to be entered. Costs to be paid by appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Book et al., Appellants, v. Hall et al.
Argued May 20, 1940.
Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Barnes and Patterson, JJ.
Marie T. Milnor, for appellants.
Paul Q. Smith, for appellees.
September 30, 1940:
